com.sixdimensions.wcm.cq
Class InstallBundleMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.sixdimensions.wcm.cq.AbstractCQMojo
          com.sixdimensions.wcm.cq.InstallBundleMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
public class InstallBundleMojo
extends AbstractCQMojo

Installs the specified bundle into Adobe CQ to a configurable path. This path should be something like /apps/{APP_NAME}/install so it will be picked up by the CQ Bundle installer.

Author:
dklco

public boolean getSkipInstall()
